1231070.name: Starkheim Tournament
1231070.description:
IMPORTANT: THIS IS AN EARLY ALPHA PHASE OF THE GAME!

While prone to bugs and errors, and still pending content, the core aspect of the game is playable.

Fight for the future of Starkheim!

Starkheim Tournament is a 2D fighting game set in a fantasy universe with a pixel-art style.

Featuring simplified, easy-to-learn controls, it’s designed to be instantly accessible and quick to master.

The future is a blank slate

Once, humanity thrived in the South - until their obsession with celestial magic summoned a cataclysmic invasion. The survivors fled north, only to betray their Dharati allies and forge the kingdom of Starkheim through conquest and deception.

Now, in the year 1462, the world stands on the brink of annihilation. The war rages. The stars still whisper. And in the shadows… something far worse is awakening.

It doesn't take much to be a warrior

Featuring simplified, easy-to-learn controls, it’s designed to be instantly accessible and quick to master. Each character, while following same basic rules, offer unique playstyle and gimmicks. Whether you prefer to conquer the opponent with raw power, outspeed the enemy with lightning-fast moves, or outsmart them with technique and strategy - a right champion is waiting for you.

Be yourself on the arena

Fight as a redemption seeking paladin, a queen of pirates, a death knight, a Dharati empress, or many other fighters. Each character comes with an unique fighting style, strenghts and weaknesses, providing unique playstyle.
